title: Declaration of results
context: ยง16-28 Declaration of results. When the precinct officials have ascertained the number of votes given for each candidate they shall make public declaration of the whole number of votes cast, the names of the persons voted for, and the number of votes for each person. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; am L 1973, c 217, ยง6(f)]
